Amb.Description: level of ambiguity (percentage of lottery info not shown)

RiskisLeft.Description: whether the risky choice is displayed on the left, 1 = left, 0 = right

response.Description: f or j; which button (side) the participant pushed

RT.Description: reaction time (s); blank values mean no response

dist.Description: shape of distribution, should match the color (narrow green, wide red, skew blue)
